content.raw:
To regenerate the jobs from DSL using this pull request you can run the [core_dsl job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_core/)

I'm starting the testing by trying to finish this PR: https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/92
I'm launching (setting parameters manually) the bottle builder job needed for testing the hash bottle updater.
